segments.text: I notice the boy stretching for the cookie jar, and I can’t help but smile.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He’s so determined, even if he’s about to topple over.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is waiting so patiently for her share.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I love how kids always find a way to get what they want.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool looks like it’s about to tip, but he doesn’t care.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if they’ll get away with it this time.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is completely oblivious, and that makes it even funnier.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope they don’t get caught, but I also hope they don’t get hurt.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is still running, and no one seems to notice.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This scene is pure childhood mischief at its best.
segments.speaker: PAR
